sub_title: Business Opportunity Manager (BOM) – STCH Master Plan at Shell
summary:
Experienced Program Manager with 20+ years of experience in directing large-scale programs in the oil & energy industry. Strong research professional skilled in Petroleum, Oil & Gas, Offshore Drilling, Energy, and Upstream with a demonstrated history of overseeing million-dollar budgets, and creating value-added projects to help organizations achieve challenging goals.
I have a strong track record in leadership, change management and improved ways of working which have helped me successfully resolve customer and stakeholder needs across organizational boundaries.
I am seeking challenging new opportunities to manage and lead large programs where my advanced skills ad experiences can be fully utilized.
